verbose_text: Baseline potassium levels were higher in patients who developed hyperkalemia during reperfusion compared to the patients without hyperkalemia and its effect size was large - 4.50 [0.49] mmol/L for the patients who experienced hyperkalemia, 3.74 [0.42] mmol/L for the patients without hyperkalemia, Student 's t-test, mean difference = 0.76 mmol/L, 95% CI : 0.41 to 1.18, p < 0.001, Cohen 's d = 1.64.
